## Ray.set() method

Set the ray origin and normalized direction vector.

**Signature:**

```typescript
set(origin: Vector3, directionNormalized: Vector3): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  origin | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The ray origin point. |
|  directionNormalized | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The normalized direction vector. |

**Returns:**

void
